benchmark_details.name: MultiMedEval
benchmark_details.overview: MultiMedEval is an open-source toolkit for fair and reproducible evaluation of large medical vision-language models (VLMs), assessing their performance across six multi-modal tasks using 23 datasets across 11 medical domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To simplify the landscape of VLM evaluation and promote fair benchmarking of future models.

data.source: 23 datasets including MIMIC-CXR, MedQA, PubMedQA, and others.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the model's responses compared against the ground-truth labels using various scoring techniques.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating accurate responses or classifications relevant to the input prompts.
